name: Horror FX Prosthetic 'Skeleton Skull' Latex Mask - Costume for Halloween
description:
Special Effects Prosthetic Skeleton Skull Mask

For Halloween, Fancy Dress, Theatre & Fun.

This latex Skull mask forms around your face and with face paint effects forms with your skin. Any facial movements made will be visible in the mask. Colour it as you like!!!

Directions for use:

Before you start you might want to offer the mask up to your face and using a piece of chalk or eye liner mark any parts which overlap your face, or cover your hair line. Using scissors you can cut off these excess pieces.

    1. Apply Spirit Gum adhesive to the edges of the mask, taking care around the eyes. Once dry slowly apply the mask to your face.
    2. Use make-up latex or theatrical wax to blend any visible joins and stipple with a sponge.
    3. Use grease face paint to colour mask as you wish, covering the whole face and mask.
    4. Remove the mask using spirit gum remover and wash face with soap and warm water.
    5. To be able to use the mask again wipe with a cleansing wipe and store in a cool dry place back in its packaging.

PLEASE NOTE: This item is the unpainted face mask ONLY. Grease paint, spirit gum and spirit gum remover not included. All can be purchased online or at any good fancy dress shop.

We will guarantee all UK deliveries to arrive by the 30th of October with orders received by 12:00am on 28nd of October (or order by 29th for 31st, 30th for 1st of November). 

Many thanks for your visit.
HAPPY HALLOWEEN!!!

name: Pro Horror FX Prosthetic 'Devil' Latex Horns - Costume for Fancy Dress Halloween
description:
Special Effects Prosthetic Devil Horns

For Halloween, Fancy Dress, Theatre & Fun.

These Devil Horns can be stuck to your head or put on with a strap. Colour it as you like!!!

Directions for use:

Before you start you might want to offer the horns up to your face and using a piece of chalk or eye liner mark any parts which overlap your face, or cover your hair line. Using scissors you can cut off these excess pieces.

    1. Apply Spirit Gum adhesive (or better still, Pros-aide) to the edges of the horns, taking care around the eyes. Once dry slowly apply the horns to your face.
    2. Use make-up latex or theatrical wax to blend any visible joins and stipple with a sponge.
    3. Use grease face paint to colour the horns as you wish, blending your skin tone back into the base.
    4. Remove the horns using spirit gum remover and wash face with soap and warm water.
    5. To be able to use the horns again wipe with a cleansing wipe and store in a cool dry place back in its packaging.

PLEASE NOTE: This item is the unpainted latex horns ONLY. Grease paint, spirit gum and spirit gum remover not included. All can be purchased online or at any good fancy dress shop.

We will guarantee all UK deliveries to arrive by the 30th of October with orders received by 12:00am on 28nd of October (or order by 29th for 31st, 30th for 1st of November). 

Many thanks for your visit.

name: Movie Quality Pirate Skeleton: Halloween Prop
description:
Movie Quality Pirate Skeleton With Moveable Parts

For Halloween, Party Prop, Theatre & Fun.


These skeletons come with realistic pirate themed costumes and accessories. Your skeleton may vary from the photographs shown as each skeleton is worked on individually with unique costumes. The skeleton comes with a stand but all body parts/joints are moveable which can make the skeleton posable using wires etc.
We also create skeletons for other themes and can build to a bespoke brief, so if you are looking for a corpse bride, victorian skeleton or would like your favourite celebrity in skeleton form get in contact and we can take a look!

Please note: Due to the busy Halloween period and the bulky size of the packaging delivery may take upto a week, although we will guarantee all deliveries to arrive by the 30th of October with orders received by 12:00am on 22nd of October (or order by 24th for 1st November). If you require the skeleton for a specific earlier date send us a message and we will let you know what we can do to get it to you sooner. If ordering from overseas please message us for a delivery quote. 

Many thanks for your visit.
HAPPY HALLOWEEN!!!
